contributor.contribution: Reworked XML to function without structures

broadcasts.tip: `7[`6Arena Master`7]`f:`7 This is a 2v2 swiss tournament, you will fight with your partner(s) against other teams with the same number of wins.
broadcasts.alert: `7The gamemode will be chosen at random, each round, from: `6Archer`7, `6Iron`7, `6Gold`7, `6Diamond`7, `6MCSG`7, `6Lumberjack`7,`6 Gapple`7,`6 Fish Slap`7, `6Egg Gun`7,`6 Potion`7, and `6UHC`7.
